org.apache.xmlgraphics.image.writer

Enum ResolutionUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ResolutionUnit>
      • org.apache.xmlgraphics.image.writer.ResolutionUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ResolutionUnit>

    public enum ResolutionUnit
extends Enum<ResolutionUnit>
    Enumeration for resolution units used by images; 1 for None, 2 for Inch and 3 for Centimeter.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CENTIMETER
      units per centimeter
      INCH
      units per inch
      NONE
      no resolution unit

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Retrieves the numeric value of the resolution unit.
        Returns:
